description:
1) changed the kick drum, changed tremolo
2) what official tab?
title: King Ov Deception

description: Changed the breakdown according to the offical tab, aside from a small fix at bar 71. Changed the bass and rhythm guitar track names to Adam, since Gary had left the band long before Immortal, and Andrew joined after the album was recorded.
title: King Ov Deception

description: Okay THIS is the last revision, I noticed that during the prechorus, the last chord for the lead guitar would ring out and ruin the sound so I fixed it, the song is complete now
title: King Ov Deception

description: I swapped the lead and the harmony bc it makes sense, now it's done
title: King Ov Deception

description: Okay after using a version from guitar pro with complete drums and bass, and some guitar differences too + this original tab and all the stuff I added + adding strings, I believe I have the most accurate, and most completed tab version you can possibly have without getting them straight from Lorna Shore. The UG person used the official drum playthrough+live videos to compile stuff and I've added some of this tab onto it. (Credit to claudiorucio on Ultimate Guitar for his great work.) <3
title: King Ov Deception

description: I added bass to the intro and solo; I added drums to the intro, breakdown and solo (I would appreciate it if a real drummer could fix any mistakes); I added a reverse symbol to the intro; I named the tracks after the band members at the time; I did a slight tempo change in the beginning of the breakdown
title: King Ov Deception
